Detailed Description

Encapsulate an internet address.

Note, deriving from sockaddr_in is just a path of least resistance and should be changed to aggregation, if we decide to support ipv6

) [static]

Parse an ipv4 address string in n.n.n.n or n format.

Parameters:
ip - ipv4 string
port - port of the address
addr - result address
base - base of the integer representation (default: 0, handle 0x)
Returns:
true on success
